p: To evaluate the toxicity of hydroetaholic extract in ratsâ€™ cytotoxic studies were carried out by increasing the dose from 500 mg/kg b.w. to 750 mg/kg b.w. to 1000 mg/kg b.w. It was reported that at the dose of 1000 mg/kg toxic clinical features appeared in 12 hours of drug administration. Therefore, highest dose was selected as less than one fourth (200mg/kg b.w.) of toxic level drug to run the trial.
